title: Best of The Program | Guests: Larry Elder, Sen. Ted Cruz, & Carol Roth | 9/14/21
description:
Sen. Ted Cruz joins to discuss the botched Afghanistan evacuation and Secretary of State Antony Blinken's defense of the administration. Author Carol Roth joins to give us the latest update on America’s economy. Larry Elder joins on Election Day to discuss everything about his campaign in its final hours.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
